Debian

Archive Key

wget -O - https://packages.icinga.com/icinga.key | apt-key add -
# or
curl https://packages.icinga.com/icinga.key | apt-key add -

Debian Backports

Some of the packages may require Debian Backports repository. Make sure you enable it when you see dependecy problems.

Release Builds

icinga-stretch i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch main

icinga-jessie i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-jessie main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-jessie main

icinga-wheezy i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-wheezy main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-wheezy main

Snapshot Builds

These are snapshot builds which are not suitable for production use. If you're setting up a production system please use the release packages instead.

icinga-stretch-snapshots i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch-snapshots main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch-snapshots main

icinga-jessie-snapshots i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-jessie-snapshots main

deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-jessie-snapshots main

icinga-wheezy-snapshots i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-wheezy-snapshots main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-wheezy-snapshots main
